pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Fusion using Optimal Transportation Theory // In the context of data fusion, the package provides a set of functions dedicated to the solving of 'recoding problems' using optimal transportation theory (Gares, Guernec, Savy (2019) doi:10.1515/ijb-2018-0106 and Gares, Omer (2020) doi:10.1080/01621459.2020.1775615). From two databases with no overlapping part except a subset of shared variables, the functions of the package assist users until obtaining a unique synthetic database, where the missing information is fully completed.
